mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.MOVIE_NAME, M.MOVIE_ID FROM SCHEDULE S INNER JOIN MOVIES M ON S.MOVIE_ID = M.MOVIE_ID ORDER BY m.MOVIE_NAME
SELECT DISTINCT M.MOVIE_NAME, M.MOVIE_ID, R.R_NUMBERS FROM SCHEDULE S INNER JOIN MOVIES M ON S.MOVIE_ID = M.MOVIE_ID INNER JOIN RESER_ORDER R ON M.MOVIE_ID = R.MOVIE_ID ORDER BY R_NUMBERS DESC

SELECT DISTINCT A.LOCATION_NAME, A.LOCATION_ID FROM SCHEDULE SCH INNER JOIN SCREEN SCRN ON SCH.SCREEN_ID = SCRN.SCREEN_ID AND SCH.THEATER_ID = SCRN.THEATER_ID INNER JOIN THEATER T ON T.THEATER_ID = SCRN.THEATER_ID INNER JOIN AREAS A ON T.LOCATION_ID = A.LOCATION_ID WHERE SCH.MOVIE_ID = #{movieId}

SELECT DISTINCT T.THEATER_NAME, T.THEATER_ID FROM SCHEDULE SCH INNER JOIN SCREEN SCR ON SCH.SCREEN_ID = SCR.SCREEN_ID AND SCH.THEATER_ID = SCR.THEATER_ID INNER JOIN THEATER T ON T.THEATER_ID = SCR.THEATER_ID WHERE SCH.MOVIE_ID = #{movieId} AND T.LOCATION_ID = #{locationId}

SELECT S.SEAT_ID, S.R, S.C, S.TURN, SCR.TOTAL_R, SCR.TOTAL_C FROM SCHEDULE SCH INNER JOIN SCREEN SCR ON SCH.SCREEN_ID = SCR.SCREEN_ID AND SCH.THEATER_ID = SCR.THEATER_ID INNER JOIN SEATS S ON SCR.SCREEN_ID = S.SCREEN_ID AND SCR.THEATER_ID = S.THEATER_ID AND SCH.TURN = S.TURN WHERE SCH.SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}
SELECT S.SEAT_ID FROM RESERVATIONS R INNER JOIN R_SEATS RS ON R.RESERVATION_ID = RS.RESERVATION_ID INNER JOIN SEATS S ON S.SEAT_ID = RS.SEAT_ID WHERE R.SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}

INSERT INTO RESERVATIONS(RESERVATION_ID, REG_DATE, SCHEDULE_ID, MEMBER_ID, R_COUNT) VALUES (#{reservationId}, SYSDATE, #{scheduleId}, #{memberId}, #{rCount})
mapper.select: SELECT M.MOVIE_NAME FROM RESERVATIONS R INNER JOIN SCHEDULE S ON S.SCHEDULE_ID = R.SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIES M ON S.MOVIE_ID = M.MOVIE_ID WHERE R.RESERVATION_ID = #{reservationId}

SELECT SCR.SCREEN_NAME, SCH.START_DATE, SCH.START_TIME, SCH.END_TIME FROM RESERVATIONS R INNER JOIN SCHEDULE SCH ON SCH.SCHEDULE_ID = R.SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN SCREEN SCR ON SCH.SCREEN_ID = SCR.SCREEN_ID AND SCH.THEATER_ID = SCR.THEATER_ID WHERE R.RESERVATION_ID = #{reservationId}
SELECT R.R_COUNT, S.R, S.C FROM RESERVATIONS R INNER JOIN R_SEATS RS ON R.RESERVATION_ID = RS.RESERVATION_ID INNER JOIN SEATS S ON S.SEAT_ID = RS.SEAT_ID WHERE R.RESERVATION_ID = #{reservationId}

SELECT R.RESERVATION_ID, M.movie_name, R.reg_date, sch.start_date, SCH.start_time, SCH.END_TIME, R.R_COUNT, SCR.SCREEN_NAME FROM RESERVATIONS R INNER JOIN SCHEDULE SCH ON SCH.SCHEDULE_ID = R.SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIES M ON SCH.MOVIE_ID = M.MOVIE_ID INNER JOIN SCREEN SCR ON SCH.SCREEN_ID = SCR.SCREEN_ID AND SCH.THEATER_ID = SCR.THEATER_ID WHERE R.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}

SELECT R.RESERVATION_ID, M.movie_name, R.reg_date, sch.start_date, SCH.start_time, SCH.END_TIME, R.R_COUNT, SCR.SCREEN_NAME FROM RESERVATIONS R INNER JOIN SCHEDULE SCH ON SCH.SCHEDULE_ID = R.SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIES M ON SCH.MOVIE_ID = M.MOVIE_ID INNER JOIN SCREEN SCR ON SCH.SCREEN_ID = SCR.SCREEN_ID AND SCH.THEATER_ID = SCR.THEATER_ID WHERE R.RESERVATION_ID = 1
